page.title: 16KEITHS ACCIDENT FARMING
page.content: I WAS NEAR THE SLURRY PIT. I WAS JUST PLAYING BY MYSELF. THE SLURRY PIT WASN'T VERY DEEP. SUDDENLY I TRIPPED AND WENT RIGHT INTO THE PIT. IT WAS AWFUL. THE MUCK CAME RIGHT UP TO MY CHEST AND THE SMELL WAS TERRIBLE. I REACHED OUT AND GOT HOLD OF THE SIDE AND PULLED MYSELF OUT. I WAS COVERED WITH THE SLURRY. IT WAS IN MY WELLIES, OVER MY TROUSERS AND UP MY JUMPER. DAD HAD JUST BEEN SCRAPING OUT THE MUCK FROM THE COW CUBICLES. IT WAS SLOPPY. I FOUND DAD. HE TOOK ME INSIDE AND THEY PUT ME IN THE BATH. ALL MY CLOTHES WENT INTO THE WASHING MACHINE. DAD SAID I MUST NOT PLAY BY THE SLURRY PIT BECAUSE IT WAS DANGEROUS.
